dublin_core.dcvalue: The possibility of side effects associated with the electromagnetic waves emitted from mobile phones is a controversial issue The present study aimed to evaluate the effect of mobile phone use on parotid gland salivary concentrations of protein amylase lipase immunoglobulin A lysozyme lactoferrin peroxidase and C reactive protein
The Journal of laryngology and otology
Effect of mobile phone use on salivary concentrations of protein, amylase, lipase, immunoglobulin A, lysozyme, lactoferrin, peroxidase and C-reactive protein of the parotid gland.
